name: Reflect
description:
Reflect - Storyline

Once upon a time, in the future, but far beyond the future, in the super-future,  there will be a man, that came to the past, and into the future - our future.

From his point of view, it is the past, but it is in fact  the future.

And in the future, there are robots, evil robots that shoots lasers, and they only want to be evil. But in the super-future, the man, he discovered a technology to fight back in the past. With a mirror (which is what he discovered but in the future), only he can reflect the evil lasers and save the world of the past and the future or something.

Reflect - Gameplay

Play as the man with a mirror, and bounce back lasers  directly into the evils robots. But be careful, you can only reflect blue lasers. Buy some powerups in the store and try to go as far as possible. Move with WASD, press ESCAPE to pause et LEFT CLIC to use your energetic shield power.

Energetic Shield Power(ESP)

Shoot an energy wave forward. Every blue lasers are reflected and their power adds to the ESP damage. The more lasers it reflects, the more damages it does.
